issue.title: [CI] [Gandiva] error: use of deleted function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12486](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12486). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/2387785393

Gandiva build fails on CentOS x64. The error is:
```java

*/opt/rh/devtoolset-2/root/usr/include/c++/4.8.2/bits/stl_construct.h:75:7: error: use of deleted function ‘arrow::MoveOnlyDataType::MoveOnlyDataType(const arrow::MoveOnlyDataType&)’*
```
